goals.active: Execute the Durmand Priory's defense plan.
goals.complete: For my first official mission as a Priory novice, I helped fight off Vyacheslav's forces long enough for Priory scholars to cast a ritual of silence. The ritual prevented the dredge's Sonic Vaporizer from firing. Robbed of their fearsome new weapon, the dredge were no match for the Priory's defenders. Afterward, I said good-bye to Eir, and Prott sent me to Lion's Arch to meet my new Priory partner.
